welcomeTitle: Welcome to the smart customs chatbot
instruction1: If you did not receive a satisfactory answer, it is recommended to phrase the question differently
instruction2: Formulate customs questions as precisely as possible
introduction1: You have reached the customs smart bot.
introduction2: You can ask me any questions you want about customs and I will try to give you the most accurate answer for you.
introduction3: Not sure how to start or what to ask? Here are some examples
question1: Are animals allowed to be brought into the country?
question2: How much tax do I have to pay for ordering a phone from abroad?
question3: My package is stuck at customs, what do I need to do to release it?
question4: How many packs of cigarettes am I allowed to buy at duty free?
writeTheQuestionHere: You can write the question here
